command.text: select "CB_DataElement"."DataElementID" "DataElementID" ,"CB_DataElement"."EventID" "EventID" ,"Event"."Name" "EventName" ,"EventEventType"."EventType" "EventEventTypeEventType" ,"EventLogSource"."Code" "EventLogSourceCode" ,"EventTimeSource"."Code" "EventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_DataElement"."DataElementName" "DataElementName" ,"CB_DataElement"."Description" "Description" ,"CB_DataElement"."IsActive" "IsActive" ,"CB_DataElement"."DateCreated" "DateCreated" ,"CB_DataElement"."DateModified" "DateModified" from "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "CB_DataElement" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "Event" on "CB_DataElement"."EventID" = "Event"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "EventEventType" on "Event"."EventTypeID" = "EventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "EventLogSource" on "Event"."LogSourceID" = "EventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "EventTimeSource" on "Event"."TimeSourceID" = "EventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID"

select "CB_PassFailCriteria"."TestExpressionID" "TestExpressionID" ,"TestExpression"."JoinCriteria" "TestExpressionJoinCriteria" ,"TestExpressionLeftDataElement"."DataElementName" "TestExpressionLeftDataElementDataElementName" ,"TestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent"."Name" "TestExpressionLeftDataElementEventName" ,"TestExpressionRightDataElement"."DataElementName" "TestExpressionRightDataElementDataElementName" ,"TestExpressionRightDataElementEvent"."Name" "TestExpressionRightDataElementEventName" ,"TestExpressionOperator"."Code" "TestExpressionOperatorCode" ,"TestExpressionTemplate"."TemplateName" "TestExpressionTemplateTemplateName" ,"TestExpressionTest"."TestName" "TestExpressionTestTestName" ,"TestExpressionAtrributeEvent"."AttributeID" "TestExpressionAtrributeEventAttributeID" ,"TestExpressionLeftEvent"."Name" "TestExpressionLeftEventName" ,"TestExpressionLeftEventEventType"."EventType" "TestExpressionLeftEventEventTypeEventType" ,"TestExpressionLeftEventLogSource"."Code" "TestExpressionLeftEventLogSourceCode" ,"TestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource"."Code" "TestExpressionLeftEventTimeSourceCode" ,"TestExpressionRightEvent"."Name" "TestExpressionRightEventName" ,"TestExpressionRightEventEventType"."EventType" "TestExpressionRightEventEventTypeEventType" ,"TestExpressionRightEventLogSource"."Code" "TestExpressionRightEventLogSourceCode" ,"TestExpressionRightEventTimeSource"."Code" "TestExpressionRightEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_PassFailCriteria"."TestCriteriaID" "TestCriteriaID" ,"TestCriteria"."Code" "TestCriteriaCode" ,"CB_PassFailCriteria"."IsPass" "IsPass" ,"CB_PassFailCriteria"."DateCreated" "DateCreated" ,"CB_PassFailCriteria"."DateModified" "DateModified" from "dbo"."CB_PassFailCriteria" "CB_PassFailCriteria" left join "dbo"."CB_TestExpressions" "TestExpression" on "CB_PassFailCriteria"."TestExpressionID" = "TestExpression"."TestExpressionID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "TestExpressionLeftDataElement" on "TestExpression"."LeftDataElementID" = "TestExpressionLeftDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "TestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent" on "TestExpressionLeftDataElement"."EventID" = "TestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "TestExpressionRightDataElement" on "TestExpression"."RightDataElementID" = "TestExpressionRightDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "TestExpressionRightDataElementEvent" on "TestExpressionRightDataElement"."EventID" = "TestExpressionRightDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."CB_ExpressionOperator" "TestExpressionOperator" on "TestExpression"."OperatorID" = "TestExpressionOperator"."OperatorID" left join "dbo"."CB_QueryTemplate" "TestExpressionTemplate" on "TestExpression"."TemplateID" = "TestExpressionTemplate"."TemplateID" left join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "TestExpressionTest" on "TestExpression"."TestID" = "TestExpressionTest"."TestID" left join "dbo"."Dim_EventAttribute" "TestExpressionAtrributeEvent" on "TestExpression"."AtrributeEventID" = "TestExpressionAtrributeEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "TestExpressionLeftEvent" on "TestExpression"."LeftEventID" = "TestExpressionLeftEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "TestExpressionLeftEventEventType" on "TestExpressionLeftEvent"."EventTypeID" = "TestExpressionLeftEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "TestExpressionLeftEventLogSource" on "TestExpressionLeftEvent"."LogSourceID" = "TestExpressionLeftEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "TestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource" on "TestExpressionLeftEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "TestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "TestExpressionRightEvent" on "TestExpression"."RightEventID" = "TestExpressionRightEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "TestExpressionRightEventEventType" on "TestExpressionRightEvent"."EventTypeID" = "TestExpressionRightEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "TestExpressionRightEventLogSource" on "TestExpressionRightEvent"."LogSourceID" = "TestExpressionRightEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "TestExpressionRightEventTimeSource" on "TestExpressionRightEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "TestExpressionRightEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."CB_TestCriteria" "TestCriteria" on "CB_PassFailCriteria"."TestCriteriaID" = "TestCriteria"."TestCriteriaID"

"Weight" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."Threshold" "Threshold" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."TemplateID" "TemplateID" ,"Template"."TemplateName" "TemplateTemplateName" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."JoinCriteria" "JoinCriteria" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."DateCreated" "DateCreated" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."DateModified" "DateModified" from "dbo"."CB_TestExpressions" "CB_TestExpressions" left join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "Test" on "CB_TestExpressions"."TestID" = "Test"."TestID" left join "dbo"."CB_TestExpressions" "ParentTestExpression" on "CB_TestExpressions"."ParentTestExpressionID" = "ParentTestExpression"."TestExpressionID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElement" on "ParentTestExpression"."LeftDataElementID" = join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "ParentTestExpressionTest" on "ParentTestExpression"."TestID" = "ParentTestExpressionTest"."TestID" left join "dbo"."Dim_EventAttribute" "ParentTestExpressionAtrributeEvent" on command.text: select "CB_TestPopulation"."TestPopulationID" "TestPopulationID" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."TestID" "TestID" ,"Test"."TestName" "TestTestName" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."PersonOrGroup" "PersonOrGroup" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."PeopleID" "PeopleID" ,"People"."Name" "PeopleName" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."GroupID" "GroupID" ,"Group"."GroupCode" "GroupGroupCode" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."IsPass" "IsPass" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."DateCreated" "DateCreated" ,"CB_TestPopulation"."DateModified" "DateModified" from "dbo"."CB_TestPopulation" "CB_TestPopulation" left join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "Test" on "CB_TestPopulation"."TestID" = "Test"."TestID" left join "dbo"."DIM_People" "People" on "CB_TestPopulation"."PeopleID" = "People"."PeopleID" left join "dbo"."LU_Groups" "Group" on "CB_TestPopulation"."GroupID" = "Group"."GroupID"
